news_header: Charities criticize Ofgem's plans for standing charges on energy bills, calling them complicated and unfair.
news_original_title: Backlash over energy standing charges shake-up
news_text: Charities and energy providers criticize Ofgem's plans to change standing charges on energy bills, arguing they are complicated and do not address affordability issues. Many billpayers find fixed daily charges unfair, prompting a review. Ofgem's proposal includes a dual pricing option but faces backlash for potentially hiding charges within unit rates.
